markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[I](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1969)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[I](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1969)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 35</row>

**Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40); (can't speak any language), [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +14, [Spellscar Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +19, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[_thunder helm_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1593)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 110

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, burrow 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
arm +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +16,
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus I venom

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 25
- **1st**
[Shockwave](/Spells.aspx?ID=587) (at will)
- **3rd**
[Noxious Vapors](/Spells.aspx?ID=704), [Shifting Sand](/Spells.aspx?ID=586)

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d8+8 bludgeoning

**I Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage, enfeebled 1, and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage, enfeebled 2, and flat-footed (1 round)

**Writhing Arms** <actions string="Two Actions" />  I makes up to four Strikes with different arms, each against a different target. Each attack counts separately for their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until all attacks have been made. If I subsequently uses the [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) action, they can Grab any number of creatures they hit with Writhing Arms.

</column>
name: I
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 35</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 110

**AC** 25

**Fort** +14

**Ref** +12

**Will** +14

**Perception** +19
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>

</summary>
text: I Recall Knowledge - Aberration (Occultism): DC 33 Unspecific Lore : DC 31 Specific Lore : DC 28 I Source Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz pg. 35 Perception +19; darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Common, Gnoll, Osiriani; (can't speak any language), telepathy 100 feet Skills Arcana +16, Athletics +16, Diplomacy +14, Spellscar Lore +19, Thievery +16 Str +4 Dex +1 Con +2 Int +4 Wis +2 Cha +1 Items thunder helm --- AC 25 Fort +14 Ref +12 Will +14 HP 110 Resistances bludgeoning 10 --- Speed 25 feet, burrow 25 feet Melee Single Action arm +16 (Agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+6 bludgeoning plus Grab Melee Single Action beak +16, Damage 2d8+6 piercing plus I venom Primal Innate Spells DC 25 - 1st Shockwave (at will) - 3rd Noxious Vapors, Shifting Sand Constrict Single Action 1d8+8 bludgeoning I Venom (Poison) Saving Throw DC 25 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 6 rounds; Stage 1 2d6 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round); Stage 2 2d6 poison damage, enfeebled 1, and flat-footed (1 round); Stage 3 2d6 poison damage, enfeebled 2, and flat-footed (1 round) Writhing Arms Two Actions I makes up to four Strikes with different arms, each against a different target. Each attack counts separately for their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until all attacks have been made. If I subsequently uses the Grab action, they can Grab any number of creatures they hit with Writhing Arms.
